title: Image Recognition for Medicine Package Quality Control
description: Researched effectiveness of image preprocessing and machine learning techniques to classify damaged medicine packaging.

title: Equinet
description: Developing a platform to democratize access private investments.

title: Coefficient of Determination (R<sup>2</sup>) Visualizer
description: Helped create an educational visualization to demonstrate the calculation for R<sup>2</sup> in two variable statistics. Currently used to teach 100+ AP Statistics students per year.

title: Uno
description: Recreated Uno in Java with a GUI and supporting local multiplayer using Java sockets.

title: Retro Game Chrome Extension
description: Migrated Breakout and Pong to a browser extension window for simple and convenient user access.
